Title: Everything's Coming Up Lucifer
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Joe Henderson, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Lucifer and Chloe look into the murder of a stand-in actress; Chloe's faith in Lucifer is tested.
